src.java.com.infusion.util.domain.event
Class HibernateEventAdapter

java.lang.Object
  src.java.com.infusion.util.domain.event.HibernateEventAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernate.event.AutoFlushEventListener
class HibernateEventAdapter

Class that publishes all major hibernate events into our eventing system so they can be easily listened to. All events are published with the event names of:

  • hibernate (This publishes an org.hibernate.event.AbstractEvent)
  • hibernate.[eventType] (ie. hibernate.preDelete or hibernate.flush) (This publishes the specific type of event)
  • hibernate.[eventType].[entityName] (when applicable) eg. hibernate.delete.Contact (This publishes the specific type of event)

Field Summary
EventBroker eventBroker

EventBroker is used to publish the events.

SessionFactory sessionFactory

SessionFactory is used to add the event handlers.

Fires 2 or 3 events, one generic hibernate event, one hibernate.eventName, and one hibernate.eventName.entityClass (where entityClass is applicable)

Field Detail

eventBroker

EventBroker eventBroker
EventBroker is used to publish the events.

sessionFactory

SessionFactory sessionFactory
SessionFactory is used to add the event handlers. We add the handlers the same way the grails plugin does.
